text:
Create a new publication as described in
http://lenya.apache.org/docs/2_0_x/tutorials/newpublication/index.html.
Trying to request http://<hostname>/<pubname>/introduction.html the following
error occurs:
"The user 'admin' is not authorized to access the page
'/<pubname>/introduction.html'."

Renaming the file .../access-control/policies/introduction.html/url-policy.acml
to subtree-policy.acml solves the problem. If someone else can reproduce this, I
think the documentation should be changed accordingly.

One more little thing in the documentation ist the file
$PUB_HOME/config/search/lucene_index.xml.
It is the only file that contains the pblication name. This is easily
overlooked; well, at least by me. ;-)
This should be mentioned so that the user knows he must replace the name if he
chose a different one.
creator: mangst@inventec.ch
nettings@apache.org
